sentences.english: The company reform has just started. The most impressive is yet to come.
sentences.chinese: 公司改革刚刚开始，压轴戏还在后面呢。

sentences.english: fireworks, Fourth of July, United States, Independence Day Grand Finale: Here is a grand finale for the San Francisco American Pyrotechnic Association

sentences.english: U. N. And Rockfell Center are also the end of this trip.
sentences.chinese: 联合国总部和洛克菲勒中心也是今天的压轴戏。

sentences.english: I sing the "grand finale" every time.
The final scene is the coping-stone of the play.
sentences.chinese: 这个剧的最后一场是压轴戏。
